item.title: CVE-2022-38656|2024-08-03T11:02:14.380Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20commerce
item.description: HCL Commerce, when using Elasticsearch, can allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service attack on the site and make administrative changes.
